home.description: I create modern web experiences that are both aesthetic and functional by combining code and design.
home.career_section_paragraph: I stepped into the world of web development by combining my 9 years of experience in analytical thinking and problem-solving from my Urban Planning and Real Estate Appraisal background with my passion for technology. With my attention to detail and user-centric perspective, I aim to produce simple and elegant solutions to complex problems.

about.title: My Story
about.p1: I am Ahmet Demiroğlu. I am an Urban Planner, a graduate of Gazi University, Faculty of Architecture, Department of City and Regional Planning, and a Real Estate Appraiser with nine years of field and inspection experience. During this time, I improved my planning and analysis skills and gained experience in paying attention to detail and reporting. I took my professional experience one step further by obtaining the Certified Appraiser license.
about.p2: I have had a great interest in computers and technology since my childhood. During my university years, I had the opportunity to improve myself in the drawing and design programs that I actively used for my department. However, my passion for software was always inside me, and this passion led me to a significant change in my career. I decided to leave the real estate sector, where I had considerable experience, and improve myself in the field of full-stack web development.
about.p3: In line with this goal, I successfully completed the Software Specialization Training at Neos Software Academy. This training covered programming languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and C#, as well as popular libraries and frameworks like Bootstrap, React.js, and .NET. Thanks to the 7-week intensive internship program I completed in July 2023, I reinforced my theoretical knowledge with practical applications and successfully launched a fully functional rent a car website project from start to finish. In this project, I took an active role in both front-end and back-end development, gaining experience in all layers of web applications. During my internship, I also took part in the process of preparing a domestic and open-source CSS and JS library within Neos Software.
about.p4: After my internship, I further advanced my front-end development skills with a comprehensive Vue.js training I took on Udemy. Currently, I am focused on front-end development in line with my interest and talent in visual design and user experience (UI/UX). I am constantly improving myself in this field by developing various projects using Vue.js and designing dynamic and user-friendly interfaces.
about.p5: I am a creative person who loves to solve problems, is prone to teamwork, and also has long-term individual work experience. Thanks to my ability to learn quickly and my open-minded structure, I can easily adapt to new technologies. I am currently looking for the next exciting step where I can develop myself, gain different visions, transfer my experiences, and gain new ones.

projects_page.subtitle: Works I have developed throughout my journey and showcased my skills.

rent_a_car.title: Rent A Car Full-Stack Website
rent_a_car.description: A comprehensive car rental site. Developed using C#, ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, and SQL Server. It is a Neos Software Academy internship project.

butce_360.title: Budget360° Expense Tracker App
butce_360.description: A modern web application for credit card cycle tracking and expense management. Developed with Vue.js 3.0 and Firebase Realtime Database.

not_defteri.title: Interactive Notebook App
not_defteri.description: Provides users with a dynamic notebook experience. Developed using HTML, CSS, and Vue.js 3.0.

simon_game.title: Simon Memory Game
simon_game.description: A fun and interactive game based on following the color sequence on the screen, developed to practice JavaScript and jQuery.

atak_hesaplama.title: Wonder Weeks Calculator Tool
atak_hesaplama.description: A simple tool developed to help parents easily calculate the wonder weeks in their babies' development processes.
